captions.text: Hey, good morning.

This morning we're
going to do one
called the tween side flip pony.

This one's one I've been
seeing around a bunch.

And I've even seen it
on a few celebrities.

But I noticed it
specifically when

I was on the set of
"Good Things Utah."

And one of the workers
there had it in her hair.

And I thought, oh, that's a
perfect one to do a video on.

So super easy, you'll die
at how easy this one is.

All I've done is I've parted her
hair kind of a deep side part.

And I pulled it back into a pony
tail at the base of her neck,
below one ear.
So off-center ponytail.
Just rubber band it.
Super easy.
OK.

Now I'm going to
use my Topsy Tail.

For those of you that
don't have a Topsy Tail,
this is a Topsy Tail.
They come in two sizes.
This is the big one.
There are small ones, too.

If you don't have one,
you can use your fingers

to separate the hair and create
a hole and flip it through.

But I find it hurts
the kids more,

and it's just not quite
as clean and precise.
So I really like my Topsy Tail.

So I'm going to just
take my ponytail,

make sure it's just a
little loose off their head.

Slide it through where I want
the hair to come through.

Then you take the whole
ponytail on this one,

and you stick it
through the little loop.
OK.
And then you just pull.

And it's just going to pull
that hair-- mine's not loose
enough today.

So if it's not loose
enough, just try it again.
Give it a tug.

And then you pull it
to tighten it back up,

and it creates this cute
little side pony flip.
OK.

Now the key-- you
can see even when

I did it-- was making sure
that the ponytail is away

from the head, and it's
loose, so that when

you flip the hair through,
it just pulls through easily.

You don't want to make it so
tight that the hair's grr.

You know, really
tugging on them.

And then you flip the
hair over the shoulder.

And with my little one
here, I just straighten out

her bangs a little bit,
and she's ready for school.

And she has this adorable
little side pony.

This is a perfect one, I
think, for like the beach,

or a nice summer afternoon
where you're going to the pool,

you need something
to do with your hair

after you've been swimming,
but it's gotta be quick.
And this one's perfect.
